main event: Two reliable citizens reported a sighting of an unidentified flying object in Clarke, Montana on February 7, 1952.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at approximately 7:21 P.M.,The object was described as a flying saucer or unidentified flying object,There were no further details about the appearance or behavior of the object provided in the report,This sighting is part of a larger investigation documented in Project Blue Book,The report indicates that the witnesses were considered reliable and responsible citizens.
